extension.name: PostInstall
extension.author: Nik TJ (Nik777@users.sf.net
extension.description: This plugin provides post-install cleanup of the AOI Plugins and Scripts directories. It is typically invoked as a result of running an Installation or Upgrade of Plugins or Scripts.
extension.comments: This plugin is normally distributed as part of the SPManager package

history.log: - Changes to match the new AOI 2.6 API
- changes to match those made in SPManager regarding the location of the TEMP trees
- updated to handle per-process temporary directories - now deletes old temporary directory trees
- catch unexpected exceptions thrown during cleanup()
